name: Mystery Trackers: Silent Hollow Collector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Trackers: Silent Hollow Collector's Edition
description:
Mystery Trackers: Silent Hollow Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Mystery Trackers: Silent Hollow Collector's Edition is available on PC.
